name: Microsoft To-Do Winternight
description: Dark blue theme for Microsoft To-Do.
css:
@-moz-document domain("to-do.microsoft.com") {
#main .main-background,
#sidebar,
.avatar{
    background-color: #1a1a1a; /*dark*/
}

.listItem:hover,
.addList:active:hover,
.addList:hover,
.addList:hover:hover,
.userToolbar:hover,
.searchToolbar:hover,
.todayToolbar-item:hover,
.todayToolbar:hover,
.taskItem:focus,
.listItem:focus,
.listItem:focus .emoji{
    background-color: #0a3246!important; /*dark blue*/ 
}

.addTask,
.taskItem,
.taskItem.active .taskItem-body,
.todayToolbar-item.active,
.todayToolbar.active,
.listItem.active,
/*.theme-blue .button.theme,*/
.taskItem:hover .taskItem-body,
.cortanaButton:active,
.cortanaButton
{
	background-color: #08527b!important; /*blue medium*/
}

html[dir=ltr] #main .main-background {
    border-left: 1px solid #0a3246; /*blue dark*/ 
}

body,
.todayToolbar-title,
.addList,
.addList:active,
.addList:hover,
.listItem .listItem-title,
.listItem .listItem-count,
.listItem:hover .listItem-count,
.listItem:hover .progress-count,
.listItem.active .listItem-count,
::-webkit-input-placeholder,
.addTask .addTask-button,
.taskItemInfo,
.addTask .addTask-input,
.listTitle,
.tasksToolbar .tasksToolbar-subline,
.taskItemInfo-date .taskItemInfo-label,
.taskItemInfo-myDay .taskItemInfo-label,
.button.theme{
    color: #bbbbbb !important;  /*grey clear*/ 
}

.taskItem-titleWrapper{
    color: #00adee; /*blue*/
}

.addTask .addTask-icon svg path,
#sidebar .sidebar-header .searchToolbar svg g,
#sidebar .sidebar-footer svg g,
#sidebar .sidebar-header svg g,
.icon svg path,
.fill-blue svg *,
.icon.blue svg,
.todayToolbar-icon svg path,
.cortanaButton .icon svg,
.toolbarButton .toolbarButton-icon path,
.toolbarButton .toolbarButton-icon svg,
.cortanaButton:focus path{
    fill: #00adee; /*blue*/
}

}
